effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

short_effect.black_white: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 50% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Cloaked in flames, the user dances and flaps its wings. It may also raise the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
